title: UK Stocks Dip, French Shares Subdued in Thin Holiday Trading
description: UK shares edged lower and French shares were muted in thin trading, while most major European benchmarks were closed for Christmas holidays.
content: UK shares edged lower and French shares were muted in thin trading, while most major European benchmarks were closed for Christmas holidays.
